home.title: DevLab
home.description: A collection of powerful, privacy-focused developer tools. All processing happens locally in your browser.
home.getStartedDescription: Start visualising and querying your JSON data with our intuitive JSONPath-based tool.
home.bmiCalculatorDescription: Calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) to assess your weight status and health. Get instant results with personalised advice based on your BMI category.

tools.title: üõ†Ô∏è Developer Tools
tools.description: A growing collection of practical tools for developers and everyday use.

privacy.title: üîí Privacy First
privacy.description: All processing happens locally in your browser. No data is ever sent to servers.

free.title: ‚ú® Free & Open
free.description: Completely free to use with no limitations. Open source and transparent.

about.title: About DevLab
about.description: A powerful, privacy-focused tool for debugging and visualising complex JSON data structures.

openSource.title: üì¶ Open Source & Deployment
openSource.description: This project is open source and available on GitHub. You can view the source code, contribute, or deploy your own instance.
openSource.starUsDescription: If you find this project helpful, we'd greatly appreciate it if you could give us a star on GitHub. It helps others discover the project and motivates us to keep improving!
openSource.selfHostingDescription: You can deploy this application yourself! The repository includes all necessary configuration files. Simply clone the repository, install dependencies, and deploy to your preferred hosting platform (Vercel, Netlify, or any static hosting service).

privacy.title: üîí Privacy & Data Security
privacy.description: We believe that your data belongs to you. This application is designed as a purely client-side tool. All JSON parsing, path evaluation, and visual rendering are performed locally within your browser. No data is ever uploaded to any server, ensuring that sensitive configuration or user data remains entirely private.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: The best way to reach us is via our GitHub repository.

whyGitHub.title: ü§ù Why GitHub Issues?
whyGitHub.description: We use GitHub to track all bug reports and feature requests. This ensures our development process remains transparent and that your feedback is properly prioritised by the community.

howItWorks.title: How it works:
howItWorks.step1: Fill in the enquiry details in the form provided.
howItWorks.step3: You will be redirected to GitHub with the data pre-filled.
howItWorks.step4: Simply hit "Submit new issue" on their site.

contact.email: Alternatively, you can email us directly at:

form.subject: Subject
form.typeHelp: Selecting a type helps us categorise and prioritise your issue.

bmi.title: BMI Calculator
bmi.description: Calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) to assess your weight status and health.

result.title: Your BMI Result
result.emptyState: Enter your weight and height to calculate your BMI

advice.underweight: You may need to gain weight. Consider consulting with a healthcare professional for personalised advice.
advice.normal: You have a healthy weight for your height. Maintain your current lifestyle with regular exercise and balanced nutrition.
advice.overweight: You may benefit from losing some weight. Consider increasing physical activity and improving your diet.
advice.obese: You may be at increased health risk. It's recommended to consult with a healthcare professional for guidance.
